page.title: 01GENERAL KIRKBY FLEETHAM AREA
page.content: KIRKBY FLEETHAM,FENCOTES AND SCRUTON ARE SITUATED N.W. OF NORTHALLERTON THE COUNTY TOWN OF NORTH YORKSHIRE. THE AREA IS MAINLY AGRICULTURAL LAND HUGGING THE SOUTHERN BANK OF THE RIVER SWALE. K/FLEETHAM IS MAINLY CENTRED AROUND A VILLAGE GREEN WHILST THE FENCOTES & SCRUTON HAVE BASICALLY RIBBON DEVELOPMENT. K/FLEETHAM CHURCH IS SITUATED AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE WHILST THE CHURCH IS AN INTEGRAL PART OF SCRUTON AND GREAT FENCOTE. EACH VILLAGE HAS A SHOP/POST OFFICE. K/FLEETHAM AND SCRUTON HAVE A VILLAGE HALL. THE ONLY VILLAGE SCHOOL IS IN KIRKBY FLEETHAM.SCRUTON CHILDREN TRAVEL TO AINDERBY STEEPLE. THE ONLY LOCAL INDUSTRY IS ROAD HAULAGE.
